Title: Requires institutions of higher education to provide notice to students with education loans that refunds of overpayments of tuition or fees are loan moneys that must be repaid to the lender
Summary: Requires institutions of higher education to provide notice to students with education loans that refunds of overpayments of tuition or fees are loan moneys that must be repaid to the lender.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to requiring institutions of higher education to provide conspicuous notice to students, having education loans, that refunds of overpayments of tuition or fees have to be repaid to the lender
